text: One of the most memorable video games I've ever had the joy to play. Both Shenmue 1 and 2 are fantastic and filled with a real and immersed world that the player will become quite attached to. Thanks for the memory as well SupraDarky!

text: This music reminds me a lot of Joe Hisaishi's work. His pieces from Spirited Away in particular. An understated, echoing piano played against a few soft strings. Wonderful.

author: Courtney Wuistinger

text:
Over the course of my gaming life I heard so many great things about Shenmue, but never actually played it.
Just from the sheer presentation of it I can see that the game was ahead of its time and why so many people still remember it and talk about it like it came out yesterday.
Even though I never played it, I am looking forward of doing so one day and would definitely love to see a sequel, if not just for the dedicated fans that want as much.
